name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Sensr.net
description: This is a repository of sensr.net APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Sensr.net
apis.description: Sensr.net keeps track of interesting images and alert you when something happens. Were starting off with basic motion detection. We keep the images around and organize them by time and day. Well send you an email or a text message if youd like when ...
